review_blob: Light yellow coloured and hazy. Has a white head, lasting. Aroma is hoppy, light rubber. No sweetness, heavy bitter finish.

Pours red, with a pink head. Aroma is raspberries, and the taste is of sour raspberries. Body is on the thin side. It doesnt really taste like beer, more like a raspberry cider. Glad I was able to try it.
Nice complex aroma with heavy notes of sweet chocolate. Taste is the same but it dosent work aswell as in the aroma. The peanut butter takes over and makes It a bit too sweet.
beer_name: Omnipollo / Buxton Yellow Belly Peanut Butter Biscuit Stout

review_blob: Golden color, thick white head. Grapefruity aroma, juicy, lemon. Flavor has grapefruit juice all over. Nice bitterness some perfumy notes. Strong bitterness. Bit one dimensional.
Bottle. Pours golden with whiteish head. The head doesnt stay. Aroma is sweet, grainy, malty. Flavor follows the nose. Finish has some dry bitterness. Overall: rather bad.
Small white head... light red orange colour.. smell fruity sweet hop.. taste hops fruity spices some carbo.. shared by drebus.
Smells good too; fruity and oaky with mild yeast notes. Tastes like it smells with a tart, dry mouthfeel and a bit of earthiness. Good beer!
beer_name: Tired Hands The Emptiness Is Eternal

review_blob: Lovely reddish glow... good fruuty f r esh hops.. winy... some cherries but young... sweet bitter with sour notes... nice
A brown beer with a beige head. Slightly malty aroma. Flavour is malty with a caramel-like sweetness. (Bottle 33cl)
Clear blond, little head. Aroma of hops. Lively carbonation, light body. Refreshing taste with sweet accents. A nice, light beer.
